name: MUSYNX
description: Indie rhythm game MUSYNX now on STEAM! Real "KEY" Sound System, Classic Gameplay, Unique Visual Themes and Constant Music Updates! MUSYNX is waiting for you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
